Posts.EditableText: Im on mac and it always shows an error occurred, help
Posts.HTML: Im on mac and it always shows an error occurred, help

Posts.EditableText:
Using the web editor?

Make sure the address you are using starts with `https://`, not `http://`.
Posts.HTML:
Using the web editor?

Make sure the address you are using starts with https://, not http://.

Posts.EditableText: I had a similar story. I was trying to make a game, and it either wouldn't load, or it had a lot of internal errors. I ended up deleting it before I realised that it, for whatever reason, would work if I didn't have a special background colour. If you can get into your game, maybe try it? I don't think there could be any harm in trying?
Posts.HTML: I had a similar story. I was trying to make a game, and it either wouldn't load, or it had a lot of internal errors. I ended up deleting it before I realised that it, for whatever reason, would work if I didn't have a special background colour. If you can get into your game, maybe try it? I don't think there could be any harm in trying?
